description:
Per http://www.gossamer-threads.com/lists/xen/devel/374061  Xen Wiki Instructions are supposed to work only
with legacy ( nova ) nova-networking . See http://wiki.xen.org/wiki/OpenStack_via_DevStack.
In mean time it seems as a serious disadvantage. Limiting driver ability to work only with Ubuntu Juno and higher releases.
title: Nova libvirt-xen driver doesn't support neutron

comments.content:
Per http://www.gossamer-threads.com/lists/xen/devel/374061  Xen Wiki Instructions are supposed to work only
with legacy ( nova ) nova-networking . See http://wiki.xen.org/wiki/OpenStack_via_DevStack.
In mean time it seems as a serious disadvantage. Limiting driver ability to work only with Ubuntu Juno and higher releases.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~andrew-shvartz2015

comments.content: Not sure it's a bug (even wishlist), you should create a blueprint instead.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sylvain-bauza
